tiles.name: Coastal Shinjuku
tiles.description: Neon-drenched streets meet the ocean. Bustling markets and skyscrapers define this waterfront district, with Aetherium conduits humming beneath.

tiles.name: Market Square
tiles.description: A vibrant hub of commerce and hidden pathways, located at the heart of the city. Magic presence is palpable.

tiles.name: Skyscraper District
tiles.description: Towering skyscrapers pierce the sky, casting ominous shadows. A major Aetherium conduit runs through the core.

tiles.name: Residential Block
tiles.description: Typical cyberpunk residential area, with neon signs and hidden pathways to underground areas. Amelia's apartment is located here.

tiles.name: Central Subway Station
tiles.description: A busy subway hub connecting different parts of the city and providing access to deeper, hidden levels.

tiles.name: Ancient Ruins Entrance
tiles.description: Hidden entrance to ancient ruins beneath Neo-Tokyo, shrouded in mystery and ominous atmosphere. Ley line nexus nearby.

tiles.name: Lumin Enclave Outskirts
tiles.description: The outer edges of the hidden Lumin enclaves, accessible through hidden pathways and the subway. Magic presence is strong.

tiles.name: Ley Line Nexus Chamber
tiles.description: A chamber deep beneath the city, housing a powerful Ley line nexus point. Ancient structures are visible.

tiles.name: Lumin Sanctuary
tiles.description: The heart of the Lumin enclaves, a place of both vibrant energy and ominous secrets. Aetherium conduits power the area.
